#: The CUPS Printing System - daemon package
name: cups

#: DesktopEntry Execution, is a program to generate and
execute DesktopEntry files of the Application type
name: dex

#: All-in-one voice and text chat for gamers that's free and secure.
name: discord

#: Free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP).
Used as the RDP implementation with Remmina as the main GUI.
name: freerdp

#: View current processes and monitor system state
name: gnome-system-monitor

#: LightDM greeter that uses WebKit2 for theming via HTML/JavaScript.
name: lightdm-webkit2-greeter

#: Network connection manager and user application
name: networkmanager

#: A font supporting emoji is required for full support with the
name: noto-fonts-emoji

#: X compositor that may fix tearing issues.
name: picom

#: Remote desktop client written in GTK+.
name: remmina

#: GNOME application for managing keys in GNOME keyring
name: seahorse

#: a collection of performance monitoring tools
name: sysstat

#: Command line tools that assist applications with a variety of desktop
integration tasks, including programs such as
name: xdg-utils

#: Used to support clipboard copy/paste with the
terminal for aliases such as `pbcopy` and `pbpaste`.
name: xsel

#: Display graphical dialog boxes from shell scripts.
name: zenity
